edu.rit.gpu

Class GpuMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.rit.gpu.GpuVbl
      • edu.rit.gpu.GpuMatrix
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GpuByteMatrix, GpuDoubleMatrix, GpuFloatMatrix, GpuIntMatrix, GpuLongMatrix, GpuShortMatrix

    public abstract class GpuMatrix
extends GpuVbl
    Class GpuMatrix is the abstract base class for a GPU matrix variable. This is a two-dimensional array of data stored in the GPU's memory and mirrored in the CPU's memory. Construct an instance of a subclass of class GpuMatrix by calling a factory method on a Gpu object.

    Class GpuMatrix supports mirroring all of the GPU's data matrix in the CPU's memory, mirroring only a portion of the GPU's data matrix in the CPU's memory, or mirroring none of the GPU's data matrix. Class GpuMatrix provides operations for copying all or portions of the data matrix from the CPU to the GPU or from the GPU to the CPU.

    In the GPU memory, the matrix is implemented as a pointer to an array of R row pointers, where R is the number of rows in the matrix. Each row pointer points to an array of C data elements, where C is the number of columns in the matrix.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int cols()
      Returns the number of columns in the GPU matrix in the GPU device's memory.
      int cpuCols()
      Returns the number of columns in the GPU matrix mirrored in the host CPU's memory.
      int cpuRows()
      Returns the number of rows in the GPU matrix mirrored in the host CPU's memory.
      void devToHost()
      Copy this GPU matrix from the GPU device's memory to the host CPU's memory.
      void devToHost(int rowlen, int collen)
      Copy the initial portion of this GPU matrix from the GPU device's memory to the host CPU's memory.
      abstract void devToHost(int dstrow, int dstcol, int srcrow, int srccol, int rowlen, int collen)
      Copy the given portion of this GPU matrix from the GPU device's memory to the host CPU's memory.
      void hostToDev()
      Copy this GPU matrix from the host CPU's memory to the GPU device's memory.
      void hostToDev(int rowlen, int collen)
      Copy the initial portion of this GPU matrix from the host CPU's memory to the GPU device's memory.
      abstract void hostToDev(int dstrow, int dstcol, int srcrow, int srccol, int rowlen, int collen)
      Copy the given portion of this GPU matrix from the host CPU's memory to the GPU device's memory.
      int rows()
      Returns the number of rows in the GPU matrix in the GPU device's memory.

      • hostToDev

        public void hostToDev()
        Copy this GPU matrix from the host CPU's memory to the GPU device's memory. This is equivalent to the call hostToDev(0,0,0,0,cpuRows(),cpuCols()).
        Specified by:
        hostToDev in class GpuVbl
        Throws:
        GpuException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if a GPU error occurred.

      • hostToDev

        public void hostToDev(int rowlen,
             int collen)
        Copy the initial portion of this GPU matrix from the host CPU's memory to the GPU device's memory. This is equivalent to the call hostToDev(0,0,0,0,rowlen,collen).
        Parameters:
        rowlen - Number of rows to copy.
        collen - Number of columns to copy.
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if rowlen < 0, rowlen > cpuRows(), collen < 0, or collen > cpuCols().
        GpuException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if a GPU error occurred.

      • hostToDev

        public abstract void hostToDev(int dstrow,
             int dstcol,
             int srcrow,
             int srccol,
             int rowlen,
             int collen)
        Copy the given portion of this GPU matrix from the host CPU's memory to the GPU device's memory. rowlen×collen elements starting at indexes [srcrow][srccol] in the CPU matrix are copied to the GPU matrix starting at indexes [dstrow][dstcol].
        Parameters:
        dstrow - GPU matrix starting row index.
        dstcol - GPU matrix starting column index.
        srcrow - CPU matrix starting row index.
        srccol - CPU matrix starting column index.
        rowlen - Number of rows to copy.
        collen - Number of columns to copy.
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if dstrow < 0, dstcol < 0, srcrow < 0, srccol < 0, rowlen < 0, collen < 0, dstrow+rowlen > rows(), dstcol+collen > cols(), srcrow+rowlen > cpuRows(), or srccol+collen > cpuCols().
        GpuException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if a GPU error occurred.

      • devToHost

        public void devToHost()
        Copy this GPU matrix from the GPU device's memory to the host CPU's memory. This is equivalent to the call devToHost(0,0,0,0,cpuRows(),cpuCols()).
        Specified by:
        devToHost in class GpuVbl
        Throws:
        GpuException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if a GPU error occurred.

        public void devToHost(int rowlen,
             int collen)
        Copy the initial portion of this GPU matrix from the GPU device's memory to the host CPU's memory. This is equivalent to the call devToHost(0,0,0,0,rowlen,collen).
        Parameters:

        collen - Number of columns to copy.
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if rowlen < 0, rowlen > cpuRows(), collen < 0, or collen > cpuCols().
        GpuException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if a GPU error occurred.

      • devToHost

        public abstract void devToHost(int dstrow,
             int dstcol,
             int srcrow,
             int srccol,
             int rowlen,
             int collen)
        Copy the given portion of this GPU matrix from the GPU device's memory to the host CPU's memory. rowlen×collen elements starting at indexes [srcrow][srccol] in the GPU matrix are copied to the CPU matrix starting at indexes [dstrow][dstcol].
        Parameters:
        dstrow - CPU matrix starting row index.
        dstcol - CPU matrix starting column index.
        srcrow - GPU matrix starting row index.
        srccol - GPU matrix starting column index.
        rowlen - Number of rows to copy.
        collen - Number of columns to copy.
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if dstrow < 0, dstcol < 0, srcrow < 0, srccol < 0, rowlen < 0, collen < 0, dstrow+rowlen > cpuRows(), dstcol+collen > cpuCols(), srcrow+rowlen > rows(), or srccol+collen > cols().
        GpuException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if a GPU error occurred.
